cameraoverhaulforge.config.title: cameraoverhaulforge Settings
cameraoverhaulforge.config.enabled.name: Enable the mod's effects
cameraoverhaulforge.config.enabled.desc: Toggles all of the mod's features.
cameraoverhaulforge.config.enableInThird: Disable this to make the mod's effects exclusive to first-person view.
cameraoverhaulforge.config.strafingRollF: Strength of the camera roll rotation caused by strafing, or sideway horizontal velocity.
cameraoverhaulforge.config.forwardVeloci: Strength of camera pitch rotations caused by moving forward or backwards.
cameraoverhaulforge.config.verticalVeloc: Strength of camera pitch rotations caused by vertical velocity.
cameraoverhaulforge.config.horizontalVel: Smoothness of camera pitch & roll rotations caused by moving horizontally.
cameraoverhaulforge.config.verticalVeloc: Smoothness of camera pitch rotations caused by moving vertically.
cameraoverhaulforge.config.turningRollAc: Sensitivity of the camera roll rotation caused by turning around horizontally.
cameraoverhaulforge.config.turningRollIn: Maximum strength of the camera roll rotation caused by turning around horizontally.
cameraoverhaulforge.config.turningRollSm: Smoothness of the decay of the camera roll rotation caused by turning around horizontally.
cameraoverhaulforge.config.cameraSwayInt: Strength of smooth random sway that kicks in when the player idles for enough time.
cameraoverhaulforge.config.cameraSwayFre: Frequency of smooth random sway that kicks in when the player idles for enough time.
cameraoverhaulforge.config.cameraSwayFad: Amount of time that the player must idle for before smooth random sway starts to fade-in.
Amount of time it takes for smooth random sway to fade-in after the player idles for enough time.
Amount of time it takes for smooth random sway to fade-out when the player starts moving after idling.
cameraoverhaulforge.config.screenShakesM: Maximum strength of all screen shaking effects.
Speed at which screen shaking rotations change direction or oscillate.
cameraoverhaulforge.config.explosionTrau: A [0..1] value linked to the strength of screen shaking caused by explosions.
cameraoverhaulforge.config.thunderTrauma: A [0..1] value linked to the strength of screen shaking caused by lightning bolt-tied thunder.
cameraoverhaulforge.config.handSwingTrau: A [0..1] value linked to the strength of screen shaking caused by any actions that swing the player's arm. Best kept very low.
